title: Deploy Evendigo to AWS EC2
description:
Production deployment of event management platform.

  • Docker containerization
  • Nginx reverse proxy + SSL (certbot)
  • CI/CD pipeline setup
  • MongoDB Atlas integration

title: RingRing WebRTC Optimization
description:
Optimize real-time audio/video calling app.

Performance targets:

  • Reduce bundle size < 1MB
  • Implement Socket.io fallback
  • Screen sharing + recording
  • Mobile responsiveness (PWA)

title: ShopEazy Checkout Flow
description:
Implement secure e-commerce checkout.

  • Stripe/Razorpay integration
  • Order management API
  • Inventory sync with MongoDB
  • Email notifications (nodemailer)

title: BlogBee Admin Dashboard
description:
Build Angular admin panel for CMS.

  • Rich text editor (ngx-quill)
  • Post scheduling
  • Analytics dashboard
  • SEO meta optimization

title: PingPoll Real-time Polls
description:
Create live polling system.

  • Socket.io real-time updates
  • Vote analytics charts
  • Shareable poll links
  • Results export (CSV/PDF)
